attributes.action: use his remaining days in power to bring Dan Sackey back to our shores and give him a talk show to host
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically I found this site by accident but thought I'd use it to show Parliament that one-time star of In It to Win It (tm) Dan Sackey was and is a hero to many. Sadly Dan is currently in sunnier climes but with your support and Tony's... dreams can come true.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
